description:
Use the techniques of world championship memory masters to learn JSON data formatting and become a master. Rapidly learn and retain JSON in the most efficient way known to man.

  • Faster data loading - faster websites
  • Under 1 hour time investment
  • Learn memory techniques of world championship memory masters
  • Learn JSON faster

Once you know JSON, you can use it to format your website data using methods which make your website load and run more efficiently and effectively. This means a better experience for people who visit your website, which means fewer lost site visitors, more repeat site visitors and ultimately a more popular, more profitable website.

JSON is used in many powerful web applications. It's great for processing data at an extremely rapid rate. If you're parsing data there are many advantages to using JSON formatting. Learn more advantages of JSON and how to use it in this class.
title: Learn JSON in Under 1 Hour
